plot outline: An adventurous road trip journey of young lovers is being captured candidly by a crazy video crew who intend to turn the footage into a music video for an audio record label contract. Did the Indie composer get the contract ? What happened to the road trip journey ? The entire plot is filled with non-stop comedy and adventure through mountains, beaches, waterfalls and forests. A movie with craziness overloaded completely shot on GoPro.
title: Goko Mako
plot: An Independent Feature Film shot entirely on GoPro exclusively for people who love craziness.

An adventurous road trip journey of young lovers is being captured candidly by a crazy video crew who intend to turn the footage into a music video for an audio record label contract. Did the Indie composer get the contract ? What happened to the road trip journey ? The entire plot is filled with non-stop comedy and adventure through mountains, beaches, waterfalls and forests. A movie with craziness overloaded completely shot on GoPro.
